scripts.compile: npm run copy-root-files && npm run build -w packages/vue-mdc && npm run bundle-size
scripts.list:entries: echo '// componens' && ls packages/ui/src/components/*/index.ts | grep -vE 'labs' && echo '// colors' && ls packages/ui/src/colors/index.ts && echo '// component-register' && ls packages/ui/src/component-register/index.ts && echo 'internals' && ls packages/ui/src/internals/index.ts && echo 'utils' && ls packages/ui/src/utils/index.ts
